messages.subject: To Unschoolers From Tamie: Special message to my wonderful friend!
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Unschoolers, Your friendship is very important to me. I thought of you when I saw this special web page. Click to http://smartbotpro.net/angel Hello
messages.messageBody:
Dear Unschoolers,

Your friendship is very important to me. I thought of you when I saw this special web page. Click to http://smartbotpro.net/angel

Hello everyone. I thought this might cheer up all us sad pubery moms. Actually it such a beautiful poem it might cheer everyone up! Thanks for all the support. Tamie

The web page is at:

http://smartbotpro.net/angel/

or <a href="http://smartbotpro.net/angel">click here!</a>

They also show you a cool surprise after you pass it on to more friends!

Please reply back.

Tamie
